title: Inception
description: A mind-bending journey into the world of dreams and reality.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Stranger Things
description: A group of kids in a small town uncover a series of supernatural mysteries and government conspiracies when a young girl with telekinetic powers appears.

title: Breaking Bad
description: A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer teams up with a former student, leading to a dangerous criminal underworld.

title: The Mandalorian
description: A lone bounty hunter navigates the outer reaches of the galaxy, far from the authority of the New Republic.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind with a dark sense of humor, in this epic battle between good and evil.

title: Game of Thrones
description: A medieval fantasy epic that follows the power struggles among noble families as they vie for control of the Iron Throne.

title: Strive for Greatness
description: An inspirational documentary showcasing the journey of individuals who overcome challenges to achieve greatness in their respective fields.

title: Avatar
description: In a distant world, a paraplegic marine is given a unique mission that leads him to question his allegiances and fight for the survival of an alien civilization.

title: The Crown
description: A biographical story of the reign of Queen Elizabeth II and the events that shaped the second half of the 20th century.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and joins a group of rebels to fight against a powerful artificial intelligence.

title: Friends
description: Follow the lives of six friends living in New York City as they navigate through the ups and downs of relationships, work, and family.

title: Stray
description: A heartwarming documentary that follows the lives of stray dogs in Istanbul and the people who care for them.

title: Jurassic Park
description: A group of scientists and tourists must survive the deadly attractions of a theme park filled with genetically engineered dinosaurs.

title: The Witcher
description: Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter, struggles to find his place in a world where people are often more wicked than the beasts he hunts.

title: La La Land
description: A romantic musical that follows the love story of a jazz musician and an aspiring actress as they pursue their dreams in Los Angeles.

title: Narcos
description: A gripping crime drama that chronicles the rise and fall of the infamous drug lord Pablo Escobar and the DEA agents trying to bring him down.

title: The Great British Bake Off
description: Amateur bakers compete in a series of challenges to impress the judges and be crowned the best baker.

title: Interstellar
description: A group of astronauts embarks on a mission through a wormhole in search of a new habitable planet for humanity.

title: The Godfather
description: The patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his empire to his reluctant son.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: Interwoven stories of crime, redemption, and the search for a mysterious briefcase.

title: The Notebook
description: A young couple's love story is narrated from the present-day in a nursing home.

title: Blade Runner
description: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space.

title: The Shining
description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil and spiritual presence influences the father into violence.

title: The Departed
description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police force attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in Boston.

title: The Fault in Our Stars
description: Two teenagers with cancer fall in love and embark on a journey to meet their favorite author.

title: The Matrix Reloaded
description: Neo, Trinity, and Morpheus continue their battle against the machines in the second installment of the Matrix trilogy.

title: Psycho
description: A secretary embezzles money and checks into a remote motel run by a disturbed innkeeper.

title: La La Land
description: A musical that follows the love story of a jazz musician and an aspiring actress as they pursue their dreams in Los Angeles.

title: The Silence of the Lambs
description: A young FBI cadet seeks the help of an imprisoned and manipulative cannibal killer to catch another serial killer.

title: The Conjuring
description: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
description: A man undergoes a procedure to erase the memories of his failed relationship, but things don't go as planned.

title: Inglourious Basterds
description: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a group of Jewish-American soldiers plan to assassinate Hitler.

title: The Exorcist
description: When a young girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, two priests perform an exorcism to save her.

title: Gravity
description: Two astronauts work together to survive after an accident leaves them stranded in space.

title: Casablanca
description: In World War II-era Morocco, a cynical American expatriate encounters a former lover, with unforeseen complications.

title: Seven
description: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

title: A Nightmare on Elm Street
description: A group of teenagers is terrorized by a vengeful spirit with the ability to enter their dreams.

title: Her
description: In a future where technology has advanced,

title: The Sixth Sense
description: A young boy communicates with spirits that don't know they're dead, seeking the help of a disheartened child psychologist.

title: Ocean's Eleven
description: A group of criminals plan and execute a heist of a Las Vegas casino.

title: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
description: A high school student fakes an illness to have a day of fun in Chicago with his friends.

title: When Harry Met Sally
description: Two friends navigate the challenges of maintaining a platonic relationship over several years.

title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
description: An ordinary man is swept off Earth just before it is destroyed to make way for a hyperspace bypass.

title: Ghostbusters
description: A group of paranormal investigators start a ghost-catching business in New York City.

title: The Conjuring
description: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.
